data.title: Best Chai you've never had
data.text: The Kontuku Elixir Bar is superbly unique for healthy drinks and other fare.  Their Chai Alive is the best chai ever, turmeric, cardamon, and cinnamon based with fresh figs. If you like the common, too sweet Starbucks  type of chai, this may not be your cup of tea.  Kontuku's Chai is the real thing.  The challenge is to get there when its fully open.  A Yoga studio shares the building and the staff might be teaching when you arrive for an Elixir.  But wait!  It's worth waiting or returning.

data.title: healthy smoothies
data.text: We had healthy smoothies prescribed by Ollie. 1 of us still suffering g with tummy bug caught in Cuba so something full of healthy things with charcoal and more added.  I had a protein boosted delicious smoothie full of berries and protein from goats milk I think. High level of ultra healthy products for sale and share the site with a yoga studio
